Identification_Area.title: ATM OBSERVATIONS AT NEVADA TEST SITE V1.0

Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

External_Reference.reference_text: Farr, T.G., W. Krabill, and J.B. Garvin, High Resolution Digital Elevation Models of Pristine Explosion Craters, LPSC XXXV, Houston, TX, Abstract No. 2146, 2004.

Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_name: ATM OBSERVATIONS AT NEVADA TEST SITE V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: Farr, T., and J. Ward, ATM Observations at Nevada Test Site, WFF-E-ATM-1/5-V1.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2007.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Wallops/GSFC Airborne Topographic Mapper (ATM) digital elevation data of explosion craters in the Nevada Test Site.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set contains digital elevation data for three explosion craters in the Nevada Test Site. These data were acquired by the Wallops/GSFC Airborne Topographic Mapper (ATM) in September 2003.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview =================
This archive contains DEMs acquired in September 2003 by the Wallops/ GSFC Airborne Topographic Mapper, a scanning laser altimeter. The data were acquired at three locations in Nevada: Sedan crater, in the northern part of Yucca Flats, Schooner crater, in the northwestern part of the Nevada Test Site, and Buckboard mesa (Danny Boy crater), in the western part of the Nevada Test Site.
The data consist of three vector data files and three DEM flat files, each with an accompanying detached PDS label. The three DEM flat files also have detached ENVI headers containing geographic data. The vector files list the longitude in degrees, the latititude in degrees, and the elevation in meters above datum as floating point values. The vector data were rasterized with ENVI to 2x2 m spacing and projected to UTM coordinates. In the resultant DEM flat files, the pixels are floating point values in meters above the datum.
For the vector data: horizontal datum = WGS84 Ellipsoid vertical datum = ITRF94 For the raster data: horizontal datum = WGS84 Ellipsoid vertical datum = NAD27
All three datasets were generated from multiple flight lines.
Please see [FARRETAL2004] for more information.
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note: This data set underwent external peer review from January 21, 2008 through February 18, 2008.
